metadata.title: CVE-2019-12980 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Ming (aka libming) 0.4.8, there is an integer overflow (caused by anout-of-range left shift) in the SWFInput_readSBits function inblocks/input.c. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to causea denial-of-service via a crafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
